name: pspspsps
description:
A head-to-head competition to win the affection of cats.

Each cat responds differently to your movements, the toys and treats you offer it, and how much pspspsps you deploy - figure out the tactics that will attract them before your opponent does!

2 player via network + offline practice mode.

Controls

  • Move the cursor left to right to beckon to the cat
  • Click your hand to change what you're holding
  • Press the PSPSPSPS button to bother the cat verbally
  • Press ESC to quit or cancel a connection attempt

Online play

Direct connection only. Open port 7777 in your firewall to play over the internet.
